reviews.text: My husband and I attended one evening of the music at this location and found it to be quality entertainment and an inexpensive night of classical music. The 3 musical performances were performed by accomplished musicians of  whom you could tell love to entertain. The venue is large and accommodating with plenty of seats, restroom accessibility and a small cafe.

was there in april for the Swan lake orchestra. was beautiful. the hall is good not so fabulous. staff were so helpful for seating. 
not very expensive tickets. 
they always have different shows.
From outside the building is not very inviting, but if you got in you chenge your mind. It is a wonderful concert hall, very good acustic.
